New Records: The Boston Celtics set a new franchise record with 25 three-pointers made in the game
Key Match Events: The game was a hard-fought matchup, with Jrue Holiday noting the Celtics' toughness when one player performs well
Kristaps Porzingis had a strong performance leading the team to victory
Pre-Game Insights: Jayson Tatum's performance was highlighted as a key factor
The absence of Nikola Jokic was a significant factor for the Nuggets
Post-Match Reflections: Celtics coach praised Kristaps Porzingis' impact on the game
Jayson Tatum and Jrue Holiday shared their thoughts on the win
The win was seen as a crucial step in the Celtics' journey
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets were shorthanded without Nikola Jokic
Kristaps Porzingis felt nearly back to full health
